tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ReturnAnalysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    reason_analysis TEXT,
    return_location_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES ReturnedProducts(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (return_location_id) REFERENCES ReturnLocations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ReturnedProducts (
    product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    return_date DATE,
    customer_id UUID,
    returned_quantity INT,
    reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Products (
    product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name TEXT,
    category TEXT,
    price DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Customers (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ReturnsHistory (
    return_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id UUID,
    return_date DATE,
    customer_id UUID,
    feedback TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AnalysisData (
    analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id UUID,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_result TEXT
)
